Technique: DOVETAIL (JOINT); WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Greek papyrus
Description: This small fragment of papyrus, of unknown provenance, but dating from the second half of the 2nd century of our time, bears an extract from the "The Political" (IV 1293a, 16-18) of Aristotle. Another fragment of this luxury edition is preserved at the Michigan University of Ann Arbor (inv. 6643).
